Package io.wcm.caconfig.extensions.persistence.impl

Class PagePersistenceStrategy

java.lang.Object
io.wcm.caconfig.extensions.persistence.impl.PagePersistenceStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.sling.caconfig.spi.ConfigurationPersistenceStrategy2
public class PagePersistenceStrategy extends Object implements org.apache.sling.caconfig.spi.ConfigurationPersistenceStrategy2
AEM-specific persistence strategy that has higher precedence than the default strategy from Sling, but lower precedence that the persistence strategy that is part of AEM since version 6.3.

It supports reading configurations from cq:Page nodes in /conf, the configuration is read from the jcr:content child node. Unlike the persistence strategy in AEM 6.3 this also supports writing configuration to /conf.
